name: ENExposureSummaryItem
desc: The summary of exposures for a specific time period or report type.

items.name: var maximumScore: Double
items.desc: The highest score of all exposures for this item.

items.name: var scoreSum: Double
items.desc: The sum of scores for all exposure for this item.

items.name: var weightedDurationSum: TimeInterval
items.desc: The sum of exposure durations weighted by their attenuation.
